Package com.guglielmoDelSarto.general.time

Interface TenorDiscretization

All Known Implementing Classes:
TenorFromArray, TenorFromTimes
public interface TenorDiscretization
This interface is intend to store as doubles the subdivision of the time interval [t, T] in n periods.
Since:
Version 1.0
Author:
Guglielmo Del Sarto

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getLength()
    Return the length of the tenor discretization, which is n for the structure of the kind
    [t = t0, t1, ..., tn-1 = T]
    double getTime​(int tenorIndex)
    Return the time corresponding to the tenor index for the structure of the kind
    [t = t0, t1, ..., tn-1 = T]
    default double getTimeStep​(int finalIndex)
    Return the time step between the specified time and its preceding time, for the structure of the kind:
    [t = t0, t1, ..., tn-1 = T]
    double getTimeStep​(int initialIndex, int finalIndex)
    Return the time step between the two tenor indexes specified for the structure of the kind
    [t = t0, t1, ..., tn-1 = T]
    double getTotalLength()
    Return the length of the period [t, T]

  • Method Details

    • getTotalLength

      double getTotalLength()
      Return the length of the period [t, T]
      Returns:
      timeLenmgth the difference t - T

    • getTime

      double getTime​(int tenorIndex)
      Return the time corresponding to the tenor index for the structure of the kind
      [t = t0, t1, ..., tn-1 = T]
      Parameters:
      tenorIndex - the index i
      Returns:
      ti the corresponding time

    • getTimeStep

      double getTimeStep​(int initialIndex, int finalIndex)
      Return the time step between the two tenor indexes specified for the structure of the kind
      [t = t0, t1, ..., tn-1 = T]
      Parameters:
      initialIndex - the index i
      finalIndex - the index j
      Returns:
      tj-i the corresponding time step

    • getTimeStep

      default double getTimeStep​(int finalIndex)
      Return the time step between the specified time and its preceding time, for the structure of the kind:
      [t = t0, t1, ..., tn-1 = T]
      Parameters:
      finalIndex - the time index
      Returns:
      ti-(i-1) the time step

    • getLength

      int getLength()
      Return the length of the tenor discretization, which is n for the structure of the kind
      [t = t0, t1, ..., tn-1 = T]
      Returns:
      n the length of tenor array
